title: Print, "Design for a Quarter of a Ceiling", 1745
medium: Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper
inscribed: On plate, upper left, in the image: C.P.S.C.M.; upper right, in the image: C.P.R.; upper right: R; lower right: 6
provenance: From the Collection of Léon Decloux (D. 79, 80, and 81)
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for a Quarter of a Ceiling", 1745.
1745. Etching and engraving on off-white laid paper. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1921-6-285-93.
